data.label: OpenAI Assistant
data.name: openAIAssistant
data.description: An agent that uses OpenAI Assistant API to pick the tool and args to call

inputParams.label: Tool Choice
inputParams.name: toolChoice
inputParams.description: Controls which (if any) tool is called by the model. Can be "none", "auto", "required", or the name of a tool. Refer here for more information

inputParams.label: Parallel Tool Calls
inputParams.name: parallelToolCalls
inputParams.description: Whether to enable parallel function calling during tool use. Defaults to true

inputParams.label: Disable File Download
inputParams.name: disableFileDownload
inputParams.description: Messages can contain text, images, or files. In some cases, you may want to prevent others from downloading the files. Learn more from OpenAI File Annotation docs

inputAnchors.label: Input Moderation
inputAnchors.description: Detect text that could generate harmful output and prevent it from being sent to the language model
inputAnchors.name: inputModeration

outputAnchors.name: openAIAssistant
outputAnchors.label: OpenAIAssistant
outputAnchors.description: An agent that uses OpenAI Assistant API to pick the tool and args to call
